title: Insanity Plea
description: Insanity Plea describes the remarkable odyssey of two fractured souls on the road to redemption that discovers what it means to love and be loved. Is it possible for a good man to go bad when he loses all faith in humanity? Is it possible to fall in love with a man who was sent to kill you? Find out who saves who in the new thriller Insanity Plea.
author: Dm. L. Carter
